content: This PR of mine hasn't got any activity and is awaiting review for over a week, is anyone planning to review it ?

I had a really busy week, last week. So I got a bit of a backlog with reviewing.
ok while you're here I also have #12911 without any review
sorry Pierre, I'll have a look soon! I've been similarly busy
